SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.components.hero

Class HeroTurretAttackComponent

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.Component
com.csse3200.game.components.hero.HeroTurretAttackComponent
public class HeroTurretAttackComponent extends Component
Hero turret-style attack component: - Does not handle movement. - Fires bullets towards the mouse cursor when cooldown expires. - Rotates the hero sprite to face the mouse direction. - Bullet damage is computed from CombatStatsComponent (baseAttack) at fire time.
